column5: I have a wood or looks more like fiberboard siding outside my house that i need to paint as it has chipped.  It looks original Manafactured paint and I dont know if it is oil or latex.  I will need to tint as the color is like a dull blue or greyish blue.  What would you recommend for paint.  oil or latex and brand.  Thanks for your input.
I am not a professional painter by any means but I think if you are not sure of the paint you are covering, it is always safe to cover it with an oil base paint..
